question: Under the guidelines issued on 2 Dec 2011, an NBFC-MFI should have minimum net owned funds of how much amount?
explanation: RBI has recently opened a separate category of non-banking financial companies for micro finance institutions, namely, NBFC-MFI under its control to remove the ambiguity over regulation of MFIs. Under the guidelines issued on 2 Dec 2011, an NBFC-MFI should have minimum net owned funds of Rs. 5 crore.
